com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator
Interface IDomainValidatorService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeployValidatorService
public interface IDomainValidatorService

Common interface between domain validators and the validator service.

This interface is not intended to be implemented or extended. Domain validators should extend the DomainValidator abstract class.

Method Detail

validate

IStatus validate(IDeployValidationContext context,
                 IDeployReporter reporter)
Validates the topology using all the applicable domain validators.

Topology validation issues are reported using IDeployReporter.addStatus(com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.status.IDeployStatus).

Parameters:
context - the domain validation context (used to extract the topology).
reporter - used to create deploy markers.
Returns:
the status of the validation process itself, not related to the status of the topology itself.

getDomainMatchers

java.util.List<DomainMatcher> getDomainMatchers(java.lang.String namespace)
Returns a list of domain matchers defined for the domain identified by the namespace.

Parameters:
namespace - a namespace URI that is used to describe a domain.
Returns:
an immutable list of domain matchers for the namespace domain(never null).

getDomainMatchers

java.util.List<DomainMatcher> getDomainMatchers(Unit unit)
Returns the domain matchers associated with the domain of a unit.

Parameters:
unit - a deploy unit whose type belongs to a specific domain.
Returns:
an immutable list of domain matchers for the unit's domain (never null).

canBeLinkSource

IStatus canBeLinkSource(Unit unit,
                        LinkType[] linkTypes)
Returns true if unit can be a link source for any one of the specified link types.

Parameters:
unit - unit to be tested
linkTypes - list of link types to test
Returns:
status OK if unit can be a link source

canBeLinkSource

IStatus canBeLinkSource(Unit unit,
                        Requirement requirement,
                        LinkType[] linkTypes)
Determines if a unit, requirement pair can be a link source for any one of the specified link types.

Parameters:
unit - unit to be tested
requirement - the source requirement to consider; may be null
linkTypes - list of link types to test
Returns:
status OK if unit, requirement pair can be a link source

canBeLinkSource

IStatus canBeLinkSource(Unit unit,
                        LinkType[] linkTypes,
                        int depth)
Returns true if unit can be a link source for any one of the specified link types.

Parameters:
unit - unit to be tested
linkTypes - list of link types to test
depth - membership/hosted configuration unit depth to which to search
Returns:
status OK if unit can be a link source

                          DeployModelObject reqCap,
                          LinkType[] linkTypes,
                          int depth)

Parameters:
unit - unit to be tested
reqCap - the requirement/capability to be tested
linkTypes - list of link types to test
depth - membership/hosted configuration unit depth to which to search
Returns:
status OK is a unit, requirement/capability can be a link endpoint

canCreateLink

IStatus canCreateLink(Unit source,
                      Unit target,
                      LinkType[] linkTypes)
Determines if a link (of any of the specified types) can be created between two units.

Parameters:
source - the source endpoint of the link
target - the target endpoint of the link
linkTypes - list of link types to test
Returns:
status OK if a link of one of the specified types can be created

canCreateLink

IStatus canCreateLink(Unit source,
                      Requirement sourceRequirement,
                      Unit target,
                      Capability targetCapability,
                      LinkType[] linkTypes)
Determines if a link (of any of the specified types) can be created between two units.

Parameters:
source - the source endpoint of the link
sourceRequirement - a source requirement to consider as the link source; may be null
target - the target endpoint of the link
targetCapability - a target capability to consider as the link target; may be null
linkTypes - list of link types to test
Returns:
status OK if a link of one of the specified types can be created

canCreateLink

                      Unit target,
                      LinkType[] linkTypes,
                      int depth)

target - the target endpoint of the link
linkTypes - list of link types to test
depth - membership/hosted configuration unit depth to which to search
Returns:
status OK if a link of one of the specified types can be created

canCreateLink

IStatus canCreateLink(Unit source,
                      Requirement sourceRequirement,
                      Unit target,
                      Capability targetCapability,
                      LinkType[] linkTypes,
                      int depth)
Determines if a link (of any of the specified types) can be created between two units.

Parameters:
source - the source endpoint of the link
sourceRequirement - a source requirement to consider as the link source; may be null
target - the target endpoint of the link
targetCapability - a target capability to consider as the link target; may be null
linkTypes - list of link types to test
depth - membership/hosted configuration unit depth to which to search
Returns:
status OK if a link of one of the specified types can be created

getPossibleLinks

LinkDescriptor[] getPossibleLinks(Unit source,
                                  Unit target,
                                  LinkType[] linkTypes)
Identifies and describes the links of the specified types that can be created.

Parameters:
source - the source endpoint of the link
target - the target endpoint of the link
linkTypes - list of link types to test
Returns:
list of link descriptors for links that can be created
